title: Bright House Networks Launches Robust New Voyager DVR Service
content:
ORLANDO, Fla. , Sept. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Just in time for the fall season premieres of all of your favorite shows, Bright House Networks is launching a robust new whole house DVR solution.  Bright House Networks announced today that it has launched Voyager, a new DVR service that combines the advanced recording capabilities of its Enhanced DVR with the convenience of its Whole House DVR to stream programs simultaneously throughout the home. 

read more
